duties_responsibilities.duty: Strategically cultivate new accounts and seek opportunities to expand business with existing accounts; penetrate new markets; oversee development and maintain business relationships with customers.
Responsible for management of retail accounts for Private Label programs.
Collaborate with buyers/accounts to define and execute creative strategies and identify opportunities to drive sales and protect profitability.
Execute against monthly targets identified and agreed upon by management.
Project and deliver monthly & annual sales forecasts to meet financial targets and drive revenue growth.
Manage market prep and appointments as well as internal and external follow-up.
Partner with the design/merchandising teams to evaluate merchandise assortments, and marketing tools.
Shop the market to research and identify current trends and present competitive data to drive newness and business.
Provide competitive analysis to maintain awareness of the marketplace and to influence strategy.
Follow orders from inception to completion to ensure customer satisfaction.
Travel to accounts and trade shows.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Business Management, Fashion Merchandising, or related field.
Min. 3 + years of related experience in Private Label Sales.
Present and up-to-date list of current account relationships and contacts within fashion wholesale industry.
Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills; must be a proactive team player.
Adaptable to frequent changes and thrive in a deadline-driven environment.
